titleStmt.title: Whereas by the antient laws and statutes of this realm, great and heady penalties are inflicted upon all such as shall be found to be spreaders of false news, or promoters of any malicious slanders and calumnies in their ordinary and common discourses ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Jo. Berkeley.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1670-1672 : Berkeley)
Berkeley, John, Sir, d. 1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 6 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the 9th day of July 1672"--leaf [2]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
